article.Heading: Will REITs get a Budget boost?
article.Summary: SEBI's decision to allow mutual funds to invest in real estate investment trusts or REITs is good news for the real estate sector.
article.Body:
The Securities and Exchange Board of India's (SEBI) decision to allow mutual funds to invest in real estate investment trusts or REITs is good news for the real estate sector. But it might still not be enough to ensure a REIT listing in 2017.

While most market watchers believe that SEBI has done all it can to sweeten the deal, they are now hoping that the Finance Minister Arun Jaitley's Budget speech will give REITs a leg up.

Watch video for more.
